DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate safety efficacy MabThera/Rituxan ( rituximab ) previously untreated patient follicular lymphoma . Data collect 3 year
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study MabThera/Rituxan ( Rituximab ) Patients With Follicular Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year Patients previously untreated follicular lymphoma ( stage IIIIV ) accord approve summary product characteristic ( SPC ) Contraindications MabThera/Rituxan therapy accord approve SPC
